message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8,000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand that $20,000 is a bit steep for you, but $8,000 is a bit low for me. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and your willingness to negotiate.
I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer you a slight discount from my previous offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,500.
